hub.title: My Benchmarks
hub.subtitle: Manage your benchmark analyses and create new ones

empty.title: No benchmarks
empty.description: Start by creating your first benchmark from the search page

display.selected_points: Display: {{selected}} points selected out of {{total}} EFs

warning.limit_1000: More than 1000 results, only the first 1000 are analyzed

median.label: Median
median.tooltip: The median value represents the central point of the distribution. 50% of values are below and 50% above.

q1.label: Q1 (1st Quartile)
q1.tooltip: The first quartile represents the value below which 25% of the data falls.

q3.label: Q3 (3rd Quartile)
q3.tooltip: The third quartile represents the value below which 75% of the data falls.

min.label: Minimum
min.tooltip: The smallest value observed in the sample.

max.label: Maximum
max.tooltip: The largest value observed in the sample.

mean.label: Mean
mean.tooltip: The arithmetic average of all values. Can be influenced by extreme values.

stdDev.label: Standard Deviation
stdDev.tooltip: Measure of the dispersion of values around the mean. Higher standard deviation indicates more dispersed values.

iqr.label: IQR (Interquartile Range)
iqr.tooltip: The difference between Q3 and Q1. Represents the range containing 50% of the central values.

percentRange.label: Range (%)
percentRange.tooltip: The percentage variation between the minimum and maximum values.

tables.click_details: Click on a row to see full details

warnings.multiple_sources: Multiple sources detected ({{count}}). EFs may come from different methodologies.
warnings.multiple_years: Multiple years detected ({{min}} - {{max}}). EFs may reflect different periods.
warnings.large_sample: Large sample ({{count}} EFs). Statistical analysis may be biased if data is not homogeneous.

errors.trial_expired: Your trial period has expired. Upgrade to Pro to generate benchmarks.
errors.quota_exceeded: Quota exceeded ({{used}}/{{limit}}). Upgrade to Pro for unlimited benchmarks.
errors.no_results: No results found for this query.
errors.no_query: Please perform a search before generating a benchmark.

save.description_placeholder: Add a description to easily find this benchmark...

history.title: Benchmark history
history.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this benchmark?

share.modal_description: All members of your workspace can access this benchmark.
share.workspace_info: This benchmark is only accessible to members of your workspace.
share.save_first: Please save the benchmark before sharing
